name: Zapper
description: Implementation of a vault to deposit funds for yield optimizing. This is the contract that receives funds and that users interface with. The yield optimizing strategy itself is implemented in a separate 'Strategy.sol' contract.

functionDecorators.name: vaultDeposit
functionDecorators.description: Invest in a LP vault starting with one of the underlying tokens.

functionDecorators.name: vaultDepositMATIC
functionDecorators.description: Invest in a LP vault starting with MATIC.

functionDecorators.name: vaultWithdraw
functionDecorators.description: Withdraw from vault and receive underlying token.

functionDecorators.name: vaultWithdrawMATIC
functionDecorators.description: Withdraw from vault and receive MATIC.
